Name: *Please read below instructions & remove before filling your details*
1. Name, Phone No with country code & score are mandatory. KPI's are optional
2. Do not change the header lables of mandatory fields ( Name, PhoneNo & Score)
3. KPI header lables can be changed
5. You can have maximum of 6 KPI's/user name
6.  Score & KPI's  can have numeric or % values. If the column has percentages, format that column to percentage
7. One excel sheet can have multiple tables, name the table by clicking on table design in the format- Leaderboardyyyymmdd. The above table is named as Leaderboardyyyymmdd
